headline: BofA Raises Price Target on Charter Communications (CHTR) to $500 from $450, Maintains a Buy Rating
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is one of the 10 Cheap Large Cap Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 1, analyst Jessica Reif Ehrlich from Bank of America Securities maintained a Buy rating on Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR), raising the price target to $500.00 from $450.00.
